channel.title: How can i add...?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to add .. terrain i suppose.. for example, if i wanted bushes on co-ord X3405,Y3405 .. is there any way to get a bush to spawn there? :P
Also,
Is there any way to change the prices of items in a shop, all the items seem to be collecting a price from somewhere, and i can't find it. If you know the file where prices are contained shout it please :D
--
Thanks :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2009, 12:11:42 pm[/size][hr]In addition,
How can i add/change npc damage?
For example, the KBD currently hits 88's on me, how can i change it? Is there a file setting how much they hit?
Maybe it's "hitdiff"? i dont know :)
Thanks so much if you can help.

item.title: How can i add...?
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

Hmm, i cant get into any .class, they’re incrypted. Is there any way to create one in Client.java or somthing?

I still can’t find anything about npc’s other than level and hp, and that’s in NPC.cfg Is that relevant?

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add...?
item.dc:creator: @Tonys_Bax Tonys_Bax
item.description:
@Tonys_Bax wrote:

It would be in your starter command in the client class.

And changing NPC damage is as simple as editing the NPC stats.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add...?
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

Thanks

Do you also know how to give people starter items?

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add...?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

1; You can add bushes through global objects, but this will cause some server-lag if over-used.

2; Client class I think.

Read full topic
